name: dapperly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A dapperly dressed man is dressed in a fashionable and tidy way: dapperly dressed He was dapperly dressed, and I think it was the first time I had ever seen him in a three-piece suit. The waiters were well groomed and dapperly attired.
More examplesFewer examplesDapperly dressed, but appearing a bit uncomfortable, he stood outside the head teacher's office.He was dapperly attired in a suit and travelled about in a limousine.He was always dapperly dressed, and looked years younger than his actual age.
